directions: In a large saucepan combine all ingredients except onion and simmer, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes. Add onion and simmer 20 minutes, or until chutney is thickened. Chutney may be made 1 week ahead and chilled, covered.
Serve chutney chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: a 12-ounce bag fresh or unthawed frozen cranberries, picked over
1 cup quince preserves* or apple jelly (about 12 ounces)
1/4 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar
3/4 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
a 4-inch strip fresh lemon zest, removed with a vegetable peeler
*available at specialty foods shops and some supermarkets
title: Cranberry Quince Chutney
